Title: I'm Going Away
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Peter Nowalk, Morenike Balogun (executive story editor), Abby Ajayi (story editor), Sarah L. Thompson (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Aja Naomi King
Plot: Annalise returns to her family home to pick up the pieces of her shattered life. Meanwhile, "Keating 4" face an uncertain future while Laurel becomes obsessed with finding out what happened to Wes the night he died.
